DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy experimental formula supplement prebiotic v control formula .
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , double-blind , control interventional clinical trial design . The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy new term infant formula supplement prebiotic v standard infant formula feed 150 day healthy , term infant .
